content: eelleeccttrriiccaall qquueeeenn by john brinegar www yarnballboogie com materials scout s swag 100% superwash merino fingering weight in queen - 1 skein apprx 400yds size e crochet hook tapestry needle finished dimensions after blocking 4 ½ x 57 pattern with size e crochet hook chain 37 row 1 1 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook *3 chain skip 3 chain 1 single_crochet in each of next 3 chain repeat from * ending with 1 single_crochet in each of last 2 chain turn row 2 1 chain skip first single_crochet *skip 1 single_crochet 5 double_crochet in 3 chain space skip 1 single_crochet 1 single_crochet in next single_crochet the center of 3 repeat from * ending with 1 single_crochet in 1 chain turn row 3 3 chain skip 1 single_crochet 1 double_crochet * single_crochet in each of next 3 double_crochet the center 3 of 5 3 chain skip 1 double_crochet 1 single_crochet 1 double_crochet repeat from * to last grouping 1 single_crochet in each of 3 double_crochet 2 chain skip 1 double_crochet 1 single_crochet in 1 chain turn row 4 3 chain skip first single_crochet 2 double_crochet in 2 chain space *skip 1 single_crochet 1 single_crochet in next single_crochet the center of 3 skip 1 single_crochet 5 double_crochet in 3 chain space repeat from * ending with 3 double_crochet under 3 chain turn row 5 1 chain skip first double_crochet 1 single_crochet in next double_crochet *3 chain skip 1 double_crochet 1 single_crochet 1 double_crochet 1 single_crochet in each of next 3 double_crochet the center 3 of 5 repeat from * ending with 1 single_crochet in last double_crochet 1 single_crochet in 3rd of 3 chain turn repeat row 2-5 until you run out of yarn weave in ends block to finished dimensions
